General.Name: Royal Prima PT
General.Description: PT Royal Prima Tbk provides hospital services in Indonesia. The company operates its hospitals under the Royal Prima Medan and Royal Prima Jambi names. PT Royal Prima Tbk was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Gedung Grand Slipi Tower, Jakarta, Indonesia, 11480
